LanguageData.VFE_Res_AdvancedHydroponics.label: artificial ecosystems
LanguageData.VFE_Res_AdvancedHydroponics.description: Learn to construct artificial ecosystems, highly advanced terraria which vastly improve upon hydroponics.
LanguageData.VFE_Res_Sprinkler.label: sprinklers
LanguageData.VFE_Res_Sprinkler.description: Assemble schematics for a device which can automatically water fields, increasing the speed at which crops grow.
LanguageData.VFE_Res_FarmingTechniques.label: farming techniques
LanguageData.VFE_Res_FarmingTechniques.description: Develop a theoretical basis for larger-scale farming operations, including centralized feeding and dedicated scarecrows to keep your crops uneaten.
